1.content: Ok when and how and why does Jason meet Captain Amelia? but most importantly where?!?
1.title: Choices the Final frontier

choices: Happy ( Thanks you for your help and stays)
Seductive (Thanks for saving me baby wink wink)
Pissed (how dare you treat my wounds without my permission!!
11.content: On a cold evening in the winter Jason was mowing his patch of land behind his house thinking about his favorite movie. He did not like treasure planet for the adventure but wrather for one of the films main Character Captain Amelia who he had a crush on since he was seven. He was looking twards the dusky sky and saw what appeared to be a shooting star and he closed his eyes to wish. But when he opened his eues the shooting star turned and aim ywords him! He ran about 25 feet before the object crashed. Wen Jason went to see what has ctashed he saw a upside down lifeboat with two black boots peering under them. Jason quickly ran and flipped the boat over and saw a shocking Discovery. The famous Captain Amelia was out cold with a bruise on her arm and her uniform torn. He carefully hoisted her on her shoulder and snuck her into his room without his family seeing her and set her on his bed. For 6 hours Jason was treating the felines wounds with great motivation and speed. At 4:30am he collapsed on the bed at 6:18am h felt a gloved hand with sharp nails caress his back and her turned around to see Captain Amelia with a facial expression that meant....
11.title: at his house

info.brief_description: a 18 year old teen meets the finest Captain in this or any galaxy. 262 gp's per addition.
info.description:
A 18 year old teen Named Jason Meets Captain Amelia from Treasure Planet. how they meet you decide
for those of you who can't picture what the captain looks like she is half feline and half human. why should I ramble on here is a pic.http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20111003165403/disney/images/c/cf/Amelia.j...

now the bios

Jason: High school graduate, semi nerd,
likes and interests, Star Trek, nautical and maritime history and craft, Back to the future, cars especially the DeLorean (he owns one), Pokemon and of course Treasure Planet to be more specific Captain Amelia.

Captain Amelia: sharp, quick witted, beautiful. Captain of the RLS legacy. very strict when it comes to giving orders.
but otherwise really nice and caring and smart she is a Captain after-all . also don't forget those feline reflexes and instincts.
likes: maritime tradition, space, ships, and some domestic feline characteristics. she thinks Jason is not her type at first but reconsiders, in time .


ok now for the rules

1. despite the fact he is 18, Jason has a big crush on Amelia and will not lose interest in her throughout the story. However he can control him self and maintain his cool.

2. it would be great if a chapter can be made with a romanic drive in the DeLorean with Jason and the Captain.

3.Captain Amelia cannot be in a relationship anyone else past or present other than with Jason

4. Jason and Amelia cannot die.

5. sex is encouraged.

6. otherwise indulge yourself.
